definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: The patient was warned not to eat oily food after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 病人被敬告手術後不能喫油膩的食物。

sentences.english: Please be careful when you pass the construction areas.
sentences.chinese: 特此敬告並請您在經過施工區域時注意安全。

definition: may I offer a bit of advice
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to offer humbly (written at the end of letter from sb of lower status to higher status)/your humble servant
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
think three times then go (idiom); don't act before you've thought it through carefully
Gentlemen! (start of a speech)/Ladies and Gentlemen!
yours truly/yours sincerely (at the end of a letter)
